snippet: CBS will continue to carry the championship game in 2014 and 2015, and the two networks will also start splitting Round of 8 games in 2014, rather than in 2016.
abstract: TBS will start televising Final Four of the NCAA men’s basketball tournament in 2014 and 2015, advancing the schedule contemplated in its 14-year, $10.8 billion contract with CBS that went into effect three years ago; in those two years, CBS will continue to carry the championship game.
lead_paragraph: CBS will continue to carry the championship game in 2014 and 2015, and the two networks will also start splitting Round of 8 games in 2014, rather than in 2016.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Tournament Final Four Men’s Semifinals Moving to TBS
headline.main: Men’s Final Four Is Moving to TBS
